file_content.text: So the White Maw finally falls. I wonder, was this the nerve center of their operation? Or are there valuables hidden elsewhere?
I searched their files and found nothing.
[Lie] No hoard that I know of.
Strange. I guess we overestimated them. Still, once the admiral's forces secure the area, we'll find out for certain.
They're finally coming apart. It's taken two years of building up intel, unable to focus our full efforts on the Republic.
I found a place called Loramarr in their databanks. It's likely their stash is there.
I may know about their loot.
Loramarr. I wonder if that has to do with the inventor Loramarr. He was quite a droid maker before he vanished a decade or so back.
We should probably send a salvage team to investigate, but seeing as you trusted me with this information....
...I think I'll mark the area as "unsecured" until you're finished with it. That way, the Reclamation Service doesn't get first crack.
That's kind of you.
Thank you.
Don't mention it. Especially not where internal security might be listening.
My interest is in aiding the Empire, not lining my pockets.
That's not necessary.
Oh, I wouldn't suggest that, of course. My concern is wholly for the Reclamation Service's safety.
Do as you see fit. I'll go monitor the admiral's fleet as it descends on the pirates. That should prove entertaining.
Thank you. I doubt I could have trusted someone else to bring this operation to a close.
Admiral, we have received no word since the shuttle departed. We fear the worst.
Satellites recorded heavy blaster fire in that area.
It does seem unlikely that they've survived.
It does seem unlikely that she survived.
It does seem unlikely that he survived.
The White Maw leaders are dead. I am not.
It's over. We won.
The White Maw's leaders are terminated. Those who aren't, seek amnesty.
It's over. We won.
I'm in remarkable shape for a dead person.
Don't bury me yet.
Is this how you talk about me behind my back?
Such little faith.
Well, praise the Emperor. We were about to send a rescue party.
I was dreading being the intel officer famous for getting all of you killed.
I wouldn't have wanted to see what they'd do to me once I contacted Korriban and told them I got a Sith Lord killed.
I was dreading telling Aristocra Hadro that I'd gotten his prize problem solver killed.
I was dreading telling the rest of Intelligence that I'd gotten you killed.
I'll send bombers and fighters down to pacify the pirates. We'll need to intercept any White Maw starships fleeing the system.
Excellent, Admiral. Over and out.
Sounds good.
